Text: Re Contact with Prominent UC Berkeley Energy Economist Cc Mr Dasovich I am just back in my office and I would thank you for any information and offer In the next weeks the Minister of Industry must complete the restructuring of the Italian electricity system and for the new year the Independent System operator the Pool and the Single Buyer must start tentative date We really need any professional help we will be able to find and I believe I will contact you very soon In the main time I will be in touch with Professor Borenstein to which I am sending the same email and his Institute that I would like very much to visit in the next months All the best Fabio Gobbo

Re Contact with Prominent UC Berkeley Energy Economist Cc Mr Dasovich I am just back in my office and I would thank you for any information and offer In the next weeks the Minister of Industry must complete the restructuring of the Italian electricity system and for the new year the Independent System operator the Pool and the Single Buyer must start tentative date We really need any professional help we will be able to find and I believe I will contact you very soon In the main time I will be in touch with Professor Borenstein to which I am sending the same email and his Institute that I would like very much to visit in the next months All the best Fabio Gobbo
